text:
At NIB, our purpose
is your better health.

With more than a 100,000
interactions a month

with manual processes, the
business had an appetite

to look into AI to solve some
of these problems.
Initially, our goal was to uncover a lot
of those deep customer analytics

which were buried deep
inside conversations.
However, further into the journey,

we found that there was a
lot more to be uncovered,

such as post wrap-up codes,
which was a manual process
where the agents had to manually go in

and select what was
driving that customer call.

We can now automate this,
creating a lot more efficiencies.

We've been able to really
understand why our customers

are calling us and provide
that self-service information

on our website or through
our chatbot, Nibby.
We chose Amazon Connect

because we had already
built on the AWS Cloud.

We knew that we had the
foundations of a secure, scalable,

and governed platform, which
the business is already using,
so it made sense to further invest.

Before Amazon Connect, the
platform was non-quantifiable
and a black box.
Now that we work with AWS,

we have a standardized
business-wide platform,
which provides quality insights.

At the end of the day, this
has allowed us to communicate
and interact with our customers in a way

that provides them more insights
to achieve our overall goal
of your better health.
